row.process:
:SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#,CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#,CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# = STR_TRIM(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# = STR_TRIM(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#) echo "Checking if PNG file exists for runid: &CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#) > 0 if [ -f "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" ] then echo "Found PNG at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#, delete it now" rm &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# echo "Deleted &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" else echo "Could not find PNG file at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" echo "Already deleted?" fi
:ENDIF echo "Checking if PDF file exists for runid: &CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#) > 0 if [ -f "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" ] then echo "Found PDF at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#, delete it now" rm &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# echo "Deleted &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" else echo "Could not find PDF file at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" echo "Already deleted?" fi :ENDIF
